entry.title: Join the Denver Communists, Colorado Socialist Revolution, Anon...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

Join the Denver Communists, Colorado Socialist Revolution, Anon Resistance Movement, W.I.T.C.H. Denver, H.O.E.S (Help on Every Street), Front Range Mutual Aid Network, and more for a Black Lives Matter Anti-Fascist Soup Drive & Pop-up Communist Bookswap!

By some strange coincidence, a patriot militia group of fascists called a ‚ÄúPatriot Muster‚Äù rally at the same time and place: https://www.facebook.com/events/763295721130981/

These are III%er and Oathkeeper types, but we expe...ct the Proud Boys and other reactionaries to join them. The fascists' event description claims ‚ÄúBLM, Antifa, and related Marxist associations are assaulting everything we love and cherish about this country!‚Äù And they‚Äôre absolutely right! We are fighting against racism, nationalism, misogyny, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, anti-Semitism, Islamophobia, the police, immigration-enforcement, imperialism and all oppression and exploitation‚Äîexactly what these bootlickers seek to uphold.

If these groups have their way, the safety and very existence of working folks trying to organize would be threatened. They seek to limit our freedom to express, assemble, and fight back against continued oppression by armed threats like police and vigilantes who target our most vulnerable neighbors. Ignoring fascists does nothing to disempower them‚Äîon the contrary, fungal infections grow best in the dark. Instead, the self-defense of working folks is the only way to combat fascism.

Our preferred strategy is to simply outnumber and outshine these fascists anytime they show their faces. We want to send these worms back into their holes, demoralized and isolated, with only their racist, r*pist president to console them. We‚Äôve done this before, including twice over the summer when fascists playing dress-up showed up looking ready for war, fired up by Kyle Rittenhouse's double murder. Thanks to our numbers, unity,and loud voices, they ended up hiding behind some of their cop-buddies, withour even breaking in their brand new tacti-cool gear.

The plan is to set up our tables and tents in Civic Center Park, as near as we can be to the fascists. We‚Äôll have soup for our family, music, speakers, communist books, and plenty of angry anti-fascist chants.

We‚Äôll be distributing soup to the hungry and collecting dry kitchen staples. Give a soup, take a soup (or five) if COVID-19 and mass unemployment has you down! We will also be collecting tarps, tents, sleeping bags, gallons of water and socks for unhoused neighbors!

Don‚Äôt get within breathing distance of the KOVID Klux Klan! We‚Äôll stick together to keep our side safe from right-wing violence, the only language these clowns speak fluently.

Costumes, musical instruments, merriment and spectacle are more than welcome and encouraged! Participation Trophies‚Ñ¢ are available for best costumes, signs, and soup recipes.

Black Lives Matter!
Nazi Scum Off Our Streets!
Whose streets? Our streets!
Whose land? Indigenous land!

See More

SAT, OCT 10 AT 1:30 PM MDT

BLM-Antifa Soup Drive

Denver's Civic Center Park

¬∑ DenverCauses ¬∑ 347 people

entry.title: "This is a call for an Indigenous Peoples Day of Rage...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

"This is a call for an Indigenous Peoples Day of Rage Against Colonialism on Sunday, October 11, 2020, everywhere. Front Range Mutual Aid Network has committed to encouraging and helping support autonomous direct action here in so-called Colorado. If you'd like to co-host, just message or email us and ask. We hope to see y'all comrades Sunday morning at the Capitol for a quick but powerful March which we'll follow by splitting up and taking autonomous actions

From Indigenous ...Action:
We are calling for autonomous, anti-colonial, anti-capitalist, and anti-fascist actions. We will take the streets and we will take the waters and the forests. We will intervene in settler and resource colonial violence. We will defend our communities.
We envision this Day of Rage to be decentralized, filled with creative direct action (both above ground and below ground), daring, and with extraordinary diversity of tactics.

This could look like marches, occupations, blockades, street theater, it could look like anti-colonial messages spray painted on walls, it could look like monuments falling or going after resource colonial corporations and their machinery. It could look like hundreds of people or just a couple of people with a targeted action. What it looks like is really up to you. Check out our site for organizing resources for more info."

Organize and list or find an action here: www.indigenouspeoplesdayofrage.org

#indigenouspeoplesdayofrage
#indigenouspeoplesday

See More

SUN, OCT 11 AT 6:00 PM MDT

Day Of Rage Against Colonialism

Colorado State Capitol

¬∑ DenverCauses ¬∑ 325 people

entry.title: ***Follow in English*** CONFIRMADO - Hoy 4 de octubre a las 6:06...
entry.content:
Abolish ICE Denver

***Follow in English***
CONFIRMADO - Hoy 4 de octubre a las 6:06 pm, Colorado Springs - ICE se detuvo y llevo a un padre enfrente de su hija de 5 a√±os mientras fueron manejando en una camioneta cerca de Walmart en 3201 E Platte Ave Colorado Springs, CO 80909. Su hija fue recogida por su mama. Pudimos informar a sus seres queridos que nos contactaron inmediatamente despu√©s sobre sus derechos y conectarlos a una lista de referencias y apoyo. Agrega por favor a nuestro n√∫mero en... los contactos telef√≥nicos 1-844-864-8341 para que pueda encontrarlo por si en caso. Adem√°s temprano esta ma√±ana, ICE se detuvo e interrog√≥ al menos a un otra persona en su autom√≥vil en Colorado Springs. Esta persona era documentada y no fue detenido. SI OFICIALES TE PAREN EN TU AUTO MANTENGA TUS MANOS DONDE ELLOS LOS PUEDEN VER. Usted tiene derecho a grabar / transmitir en vivo audio o videos, preguntar por qu√© lo detienen, pedir ver una orden judicial. Tiene derecho a permanecer en silencio despu√©s de confirmar tu nombre y fecha de nacimiento. Si est√° detenido, debe negarse a firmar cualquier cosa que no comprenda
****************
Confirmed - Today October 4 at 6:06pm, Colorado Springs - ICE pulled over and detained one father in front of his 5 year old daughter near the Walmart at 3201 E Platte Ave Colorado Springs, CO 80909. The daughter's mother was able to pick her up. We were able to advise his loved ones of his rights and connect them to a referral list. Please put our number in your phone contacts 1-844-864-8341 so you can find it if you are targeted or witness someone being targeted. Early this morning ICE stopped and questioned at least one other individual in their car in Colorado Springs. You have the right to record/livestream, ask why you are being stopped, ask to see a warrant. You have the right to remain silent and you should refuse to sign anything you don't understand if you are detained.

entry.title: Via @coloradopeoplesalliance and the Detention Lifeline...
entry.content:
Via @coloradopeoplesalliance and the Detention Lifeline

üö®Community Alertüö®
The Aurora Fire Chief notified council members of a COVID-19 outbreak at the GEO detention facility this afternoon. There are 19 confirmed positive cases! We know we can't count on GEO to keep our community members who are detained safe. We demand that GEO releases as many folks as possible on humanitarian parole and ensures that those who are sick receive the proper medical care! We will keep monitoring the situation and connect with folks inside the facility to ensure their health and safety.

Read our full press release here: https://coloradopeoplesalliance.ourpowerbase.net/civicrm/mailing/view?id=1271&reset=1

üö®Alerta a la comunidadüö®
El jefe de bomberos de Aurora notificó a los miembros del consejo sobre un brote de COVID-19 en el centro de detención de GEO en Aurora esta tarde. ¡Hay 19 casos positivos confirmados! Sabemos que no podemos contar con GEO para mantener seguros a los miembros de nuestra comunidad que están detenidos. Exigimos que GEO libere a la mayor cantidad posible de personas en libertad condicional humanitaria y garantice que los enfermos reciban la atención médica adecuada. Seguiremos al tanto de la situación y nos conectaremos con las personas dentro de las instalaciones para garantizar su salud y seguridad.

Lea nuestro comunicado de prensa completo aquí: https://coloradopeoplesalliance.ourpowerbase.net/civicrm/mailing/view?id=1271&reset=1

Palantir Technologies is ICE’s technology backbone, provides the digital infrastructure to surveil, detain and deport immigrants."

entry.title: Conditions are extremely difficult for our @denverpsl comrades inside.Lillian, Joel & Eliza are dealing with...
entry.content: Conditions are extremely difficult for our @denverpsl comrades inside.Lillian, Joel & Eliza are dealing with difficulties accessing medication and sanitary products, serious COVID risks, abuse from guards, and intense stress from isolation (23+ hours a day). Their civil rights are also being violated with Denver, Adams and Arapahoe County working together to deny our comrades a bond hearing. Our comrades suffer yet they are still thinking of others — constantly telling communjty about the conditions of their cell mates and others in the jail and agitating for their release as well. @justiceforelijahmcclain PSL Denver and Say Their Names 5280 are heroes and freedom fighters. And we need to be fighting harder than ever for them. See you Saturday!

entry.title: After the success of last year's "Confront la Migra Where They Live!" house demonstration in the suburban neighborhood...
entry.content:
After the success of last year's "Confront la Migra Where They Live!" house demonstration in the suburban neighborhood of GEO Warden Johnny Choate, @auroragov and APD spent nearly a QUARTER OF A MILLION dollars to police the Enough Coalition march up Colfax to GEO in the following week. In a SINGLE DAY A quarter million dollars were paid out to APD and Adams County officers just to try to intimidate us with fences and riot gear. That day, APD also tried to make our indigenous comrades drop their prayer sticks to enter on Oakland Street and when our comrades told APD, "You're in riot gear and have batons! Let us have our prayer sticks or we are gonna sue the shit out of you!"

Why does APD continue to do private security for Aurora GEO? La policia, la migra, misma porqueria!

Photos by @denvercommunists

#AbolishICE #ChingaLaMigra #closethecamps

entry.title: Date: Sunday, September 20th, 2020 from 1-3PM @ Aurora GEO 3130 Oakland St...
entry.content:
Date: Sunday, September 20th, 2020 from 1-3PM @ Aurora GEO 3130 Oakland St

*Please adhere to 6ft social distancing - Wear your masks, bring your hand sanitizer.*

"We'll be highlighting the refugee and immigrant experience of our AAPI communities. We want to peacefully express our concerns about the new ICE Director appointment. Please join us in solidarity!

Asian refugee and immigrant speakers from Chinese, Vietnamese, And Korean backgrounds will provide their powerful stories and perspectives. Immigration advocates and activists will also provide updates on current issues surrounding immigration.

We invite you to sign postcards to express your support for ICE detainees that will be delivered to local legislators.

Please share this event and encourage others to show up and support!"

entry.title: Message us for the event link! This series is every Tuesday in person or online until Sept 29!...
entry.content:
Message us for the event link! This series is every Tuesday in person or online until Sept 29!

https://facebook.com/events/s/immigration-is-an-lgbtq-issue-/269755914013547/?ti=cl

Immigration is an LGBTQ Issue: Love Across Borders
TUESDAYS @ 6:30pm • Sept. 8, 15*, 22 & 29

(This event is NOT being held at the Althea Center.)

ONLINE via Zoom to Facebook Live
• Sept. 15*: Only available online on this date.
• Recordings of the series will be posted on YouTube.
OR
ON-SITE (Raíces Brewing, 2060 West Colfax Ave.)
• In-person reservations REQUIRED & limited to first 50 people.

Drinks & Pizza at Raíces Brewing Company starting @ 5:30PM (Reservations required for Raíces)

Zoom Program and live streaming @ 6:30PM

Entertainment produced by Black Actors Guild @ 7:30-8:00PM

Registration: FREE 4-week series!
Please register in advance.
Raíces reservation and program Zoom information emailed with RSVP confirmation.
Immigration Equality shoulder bag for the first 100 registrants.

https://www.altheacenter.org/loveacrossborders

Mariposa at the Althea Center, in partnership with NY-based Immigration Equality and American Friends Service Committee Colorado, will present “Immigration is an LGBTQ Issue: Love Across Borders,” 4-week series of programs highlighting some of the traumatizing circumstances and critical needs of our LGBTQ sisters and brothers seeking asylum in the United States.

With simultaneous Spanish/English interpretation provided for Zoom participants, we will hear powerful and personal migration stories from current and recent LGBTQ asylum seekers. PFLAG Las Cruces, NM, will share their “real life” model of hosting asylum seekers, for which they won an award last year from the national PFLAG organization. We will hear from national and local leaders doing the day-to-day work of assisting and supporting these asylum seekers.

Registration: FREE 4-week series!
Please register in advance.
Raíces reservation and program Zoom information emailed with RSVP confirmation.
Immigration Equality shoulder bag for the first 100 registrants.

https://www.altheacenter.org/loveacrossborders

entry.title: Denver Police have killed again! And they won‚Äôt stop until we stop them! On Wednesday, Sept 9, they shot and killed...
entry.content:
Denver Police have killed again! And they won’t stop until we stop them! On Wednesday, Sept 9, they shot and killed Antonio Blackbear, a 41-year-old Lakota man.

Antonio was the adopted cousin of another Lakota man killed by the Denver Police five years ago, Paul Castaway. Indigenous people are more likely than any other racial group to be killed by police.

There has been no semblance of justice for Paul in that time, since Denver District Attorneys, like their counterparts around the nation, refuse to hold police accountable for the violent, racist terror that forms the very core of their job description. We expect the fight for justice for Antonio to be a similarly difficult one.

The police have yet to release video of their killing of Antonio, nor say much about it, because they are working to craft a story that casts them in the best light.

Justice for Antonio Blackbear!
Defund, disarm, and disband the police!

entry.title: We‚Äôve received confirmed reports of one house raid in Fountain, one house raid in Denver and a workplace raid in...
entry.content:
We’ve received confirmed reports of one house raid in Fountain, one house raid in Denver and a workplace raid in Denver.

If police come to your home, remember that you do not need to answer any questions. Ask to speak to an attorney.

Call the @coloradonlg legal line to request an attorney or get information: 720-822-5893

Source:

https://twitter.com/HeidiBeedle/status/1304114344804978688?s=19

entry.title: #FREESZASZA URGENT ACTION STEPS ...
entry.content:
#FREESZASZA URGENT ACTION STEPS

Join us in calling and emailing, Ice Deputy Assistant Director, Jeffrey Lynch,
720- 873-2899

Jeffrey.d.lynch@ice.dhs.gov/Jeff.d.lynch@ice.dhs.gov

Collective Call-In Action 9/10 @ 10am- 12pm MT/ 9am- 11am PST/ 11am- 1pm EST
Script Provided

As you may know, Sza Sza Codner or Jennifer Codner is a Jamaican trans woman detained at Aurora Contract Detention Facility.

Sza Sza endured violence and persecution in her country of origin which drove her to seek asylum and refuge here. Since then she's been ferried from one immigrant prison to the other, subjected to solitary confinement, targeting and harassment from guards, placed in men's facilities, and a host of other horrible atrocities.
Help end her indefinite imprisonment by pushing for her release.

Sza Sza has court this Friday, 9/11 and we are determined to assist in getting her out of detention and towards safety.
